column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I've eaten many a ramen and JINYA consistently is a favorite
column2: especially for a good vegan/vegetarian/pescatarian option. If you're in the mood for ramen
column3: JINYA consistently brings forth an incredible selection. I've only eaten the vegetarian options and they are great! Surprisingly
column5: are better than the vegetarian option. The broth is creamy and the noodles are thick and flavorful. With endless add-ons
column6: you can have a slightly different experience each time you come here.
